a.h1: St. Louis Language Immersion SchoolAn Innovative, Diverse, Socially Conscious Public Charter School

div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.h6: The missionÂ of the St. Louis Language Immersion School, an innovative, diverse, socially-conscious, public charter school, is to develop empathetic, high-achieving, bilingual, globally-minded students by providing a rigorous academic foundation that fosters critical thinking and problem solving.

br.p: Did you know that online education access is the right of every student enrolled at The St.Â Louis Language Immersion SchoolÂ or any Missouri public school? Learn more about theÂ Missouri Course Access Program.

div.h3: SLLIS Featured in St. Louis Post-Dispatch Story
div.p: Click here to read the story!...
On Thursday, December 5, the World Affairs Council of St. Louis hosted its annual Gateway Globe Awards Ceremony. The Gateway Globe Awards "are an annual awards program......
Earlier this week Dr. Richard Gomez, co-founder of the Gomez and Gomez Dual Language Enrichment Model, visited SLLIS. The Gomez and Gomez Dual Language Enrichment Model is......

ST. LOUIS LANGUAGE IMMERSION SCHOOL
1881 Pine Street
st. louis, mo 63103
Main Line: (314)-533-0975
Enrollment Fax: (314) 533-0974
Human Resources Fax: (314) 786-0584
